title: Average price of wearable technology products in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This is a bar chart representing Wearable Technology Products in the x axis and Average price in GBP in the y axis.
Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses has the highest Average price in GBP and Health and fitness trackers has the lowest Average price in GBP.
The highest Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses has 147.0 more Average price in GBP than the lowest Wearable Technology Products Health and fitness trackers.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Wearable Technology Products, and Average price in GBP in each Wearable Technology Products on the y axis.

The maximum Average price in GBP 220.0 is found at Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses and the minimum is found at Health and fitness trackers where Wearable Technology Products is 73.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Wearable Technology Products in the x axis and Average price in GBP in the y axis.
Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses has the highest Average price in GBP and Health and fitness trackers has the lowest Average price in GBP.
The highest Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses has 147.0 more Average price in GBP than the lowest Wearable Technology Products Health and fitness trackers.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average price in GBP for 5 number of Wearable Technology Productss.

The maximum Average price in GBP 220.0 is found at Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses and the minimum is found at Health and fitness trackers where Wearable Technology Products is 73.0.
The second highest Average price in GBP is appeared to be the Wearable Technology Products Smart watches.
The difference of Average price in GBP between the highest and lowest Wearable Technology Products is 147.0.
Average price in GBP at Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses is 220.0 , second place is Smart watches at 163.0, and thirdly is Total market at 120.0.
The average Average price in GBP in all 5 Wearable Technology Productss is 131.6.
Summing up the values of all Wearable Technology Productss, we get total 658.0.
